sentences.en: And these four candles shall remain in the keeping of the steward of the gild.
sentences.cn: 事毕,这4支蜡烛继续由行会的管事保管.

sentences.en: Carve the names and gild them.
sentences.cn: 把姓名刻上去，再镀上金。

sentences.en: Comment on this would be to gild the lily.
sentences.cn: 对此发表评说无异于画蛇添足.

sentences.en: Distrusting every light that seemed to gild.
sentences.cn: 我信不过那似乎浮泛在眼前的.

sentences.en: Don't gild the lily, gild the sissy.
sentences.cn: 不要给百合花镀金, 要给娘娘腔.

sentences.en: For the beautiful girl to use makeup would be to gild the lily.
sentences.cn: 漂亮的姑娘加上化装,是锦上添花.

sentences.en: She had health and beauty, and money to gild these gifts.
sentences.cn: 她健康而漂亮, 富有使这些天赋更加熠熠生辉.

sentences.en: To talk about the beautiful sunset is to gild the lily.
sentences.cn: 谈论日落之美是多此一举.

words.tran_cn: 镀金；小母猪；眩目的外表
镀金（gild的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 画蛇添足：对原本已很完整的东西作多余的添加

trans.tran_en: to cover something with a thin layer of gold or with something that looks like gold

trans.tran_cn: 镀金，给…贴上金箔，修饰，虚饰，使阔气，使有钱，使光彩夺目
